code: import React from'react';import Container from'react-bootstrap/Container';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import Card from'react-bootstrap/Card';import frame3 from'../assets/frame3.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ECommerceSection(){const cards=[{title:"Customised website",image:frame3}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{id:"shop",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"px-0 display-6 fw-bolder underline w-max mb-4",children:"Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lead mt-3 mb-4 px-0",children:"Below you can find a selection of the many services I offer, feel free to contact me about any of them by pressing the related button."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row no-gutters",children:cards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:card.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Complete customisation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Unlimited functionality"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Maintenance included for the first year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Delivery in 2 months"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"d-block w-max bg-dark text-light fw-bolder rounded-2 text-light py-2 mt-3 px-3 text-decoration-none",children:"Contact me"})]})]})},index))})]});}export default ECommerceSection;
